author: perezhilton
title: Mandy Moore Makes A Stunning Statement On The Golden Globes Red Carpet!
text:
Ow, ow!
Mandy Moore may or may not win at the Golden Globes tonight (January 8), but she certainly SLAYED on the red carpet! Get it, girl.
The This Is Us actress stunned on the awards show's red carpet in a beautiful navy Naeem Khan gown. Oh, did anyone else notice that noteworthy deep v neckline she was rocking? SNAPSSSS!
Thankfully, Miz Moore didn't overdo her makeup as she donned neutral Essie polish and a smokey eye. Mandy even gave fans an inside peek into her getting ready process as she uploaded on Instagram :
